itemInfo.itemDesc:
A fine flour made by Grinding.
- How to Obtain: It can be obtained through Grinding Corn.

- Usage: Essence of Liquor, Meat Stew, Oatmeal, etc.

item.name: Corn
item.desc: Grow it from the corn seed. Mostly used as an ingredient for cooking.\n - How to Obtain : Toscani Farm. Can be obtained from corns or cultivated from the garden.\n- Usage : beer, grain soup, vinegar, etc.

item.name: High-Quality Corn
item.desc:
A Cooking ingredient that was produced through Farming.
- How to Obtain: Seeds can be obtained through Plant Breeding in a Garden.

- Usage: Beer, Grain Soup, etc.

item.name: Special Corn
item.desc:
A Cooking ingredient that was produced through Farming.
- How to Obtain: Seeds can be obtained through Plant Breeding in a Garden.

- Usage: Beer, Grain Soup, etc.

item.name: Corn Dough
item.desc:
A product made by Shaking Corn Flour obtained through Grinding together with Mineral Water purchased at a Shop.
- How to Obtain: It can be obtained through Shaking.

- Usage: Exotic Herbal Wine, Soft Bread, Meat Pasta, etc.
